title: Globalisation 101
creator_credit: SKA TV, Kim Beamish and Alex Kelly
brief_description: Globalisation 101 looks at the impacts of corporate-lead globalisation on workers, indigenous people and the environment both locally and globally. It traces the history of transnational organisations such as the World Bank and International Monetary Fund and charts the origins of third world debt.
creator_credit_for_label: SKA TV, Kim Beamish and Alex Kelly
